reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: JPO Sector for Administration and Management

description.narrative:
The JPO will support ADG/ADM in the improvement of the coherence of the overall "enterprise resource management" systems that integrate Human Resources Management, Financial and other key management data.
The objective is to extract and analyse data and records in order to generate meaningful and actionable reports for senior management's and member states. These easy to understand reporting formats will support users in decision-making and used for compliance and performance monitoring purposes. To obtain these results, the JPO will work closely with the related services and their specialists (IT, HR, Programme sector staff).
